item.title: Macron Reappoints Sébastien Lecornu as France’s Prime Minister
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron is trying to steady the political turmoil that has gripped the country and jeopardized the passage of a budget.

item.title: The E.P.A. Followed Up on an Unusual Request About Abortion Pills
item.description: Scientists at the Environmental Protection Agency found that they could develop methods to identify traces of the medication if necessary — a practice...

item.title: Trump Threatens to Impose New Tariffs on China and Cancel Meeting With Xi
item.description: The president proposed economic retaliation after Beijing imposed new restrictions on the export of rare earth minerals, which are vital supplies for ...

item.title: S&P and Nasdaq Slump as Stocks Fall on Trump China Tariff Threat
item.description: The S&P 500 slumped more than 2 percent for the first time in six months, rattling investors after a long stretch of gains.

item.title: María Corina Machado Wins Nobel Peace Prize Despite Trump’s Campaign
item.description: Ms. Machado galvanized a movement that independent analysts say won last year’s election, only to have it stolen by President Nicolás Maduro.
